metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart meets with Viconia who is still hooded. However Viconia soon reveals who she is and invites Shadowheart to speak down below in the Grotto.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the House of Grief with Shadowheart2. Sit on the bench3. Talk to Viconia

25.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
25.text: Do you know why you are here?
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: A hooded figure appears from the shadows and sits next to Shadowheart.

26.speaker: Shadowheart
26.text: I'm here for the Mapping of the Heart. I wish to be Unburdened.

51.speaker: Shadowheart
51.text: That voice... Do I know you?

18.speaker: Shadowheart
18.text: The artefact. That's what you want to hear about, isn't it?

37.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
37.text: That she did. Look at me, girl.
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and looms over Shadowheart. They reach towards the hood to lower it...

54.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
54.text: Do you know why you are here?
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: A hooded figure appears from the shadows and sits next to Shadowheart.

71.speaker: Narrator
71.text: *That voice - it's oddly familiar to you. But why?*
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart looks slightly confused/surprised on hearing the voice.

31.speaker: Shadowheart
31.text: For the Mapping of the Heart. I wish to be Unburdened.

40.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
40.text: Why map what is already known all too well? I know you, girl. You possess a conniving heart, a disloyal heart, a questioning heart.

16.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
16.text: And to think you were honoured with the name Shadowheart.

32.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
32.text: Show me you have not strayed too far, girl. Show me that you still know your true purpose.

13.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
13.text: You had a mission, but did you succeed? Or did you stray? I sense delusion in you, girl; ambition that far outpaces your mettle.

0.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
0.text: Show me you at least still know your true purpose.

70.speaker: Narrator
70.text: *You sense a presence exploring your mind. Feather-light, yet strong and cunning. She is casting Detect Thoughts on you.*

34.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
34.text: Stupid girl. Do you think I'd linger in there if I had a choice? Wading through your broken, childish memories?

15.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
15.text: The artefact is all that matters. Do you remember who sent you to retrieve it?

9.speaker: Shadowheart
9.text: My purpose... You mean the artefact.

14.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
14.text: Good. There is still some discipline to be found in that head of yours. The artefact, indeed.

62.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
62.text: Do you remember who sent you to retrieve it?

36.speaker: Shadowheart
36.text: Enough of this - who are you?

59.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
59.text: All in good time. Remember - lil alurl velve zhah lil velkyn uss...
59.context: NodeContext: A drow saying, meaning 'the best knife is the unseen one' Pronounced 'lill AL-url VEH-elv zah lill VEL-kin uss'

66.speaker: Narrator
66.text: *That phrase - the drow dialect. 'The best knife is the unseen one.' You know it. You've heard it many times, you're sure.*

47.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
47.text: Your purpose is the artefact. It is all that matters. Do you even remember who sent you to retrieve it?

50.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
50.text: You at least still recall the title of your better. Good. Perhaps you can be brought to heel yet.

74.speaker: Shadowheart
74.text: It was you, wasn't it? You sent me.

12.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
12.text: There it is. You see? You know more than you realise. You know all that you needed to, in order to do as I commanded.

6.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and looms over Shadowheart. They reach towards the hood to lower it...

49.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
49.text: I know you remember me - your eyes cannot lie. I am Viconia DeVir. Your Mother Superior. Your tutor in Lady Shar's sacred arts.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's eyes widen as the figure lowers their cowl off-screen. We then see who is revealed - a drow woman. Ageless, elegant, silver-haired. Viconia DeVir.

72.speaker: Jaheira
72.text: Viconia DeVir. If only Shar would bless me with the forgetting of your face.
72.context: NodeContext: Response to Viconia's grand reveal. Viconia and Jaheira are legacy characters with a fractious relationship - it often flares up to outright hatred, but is right now sitting at distaste. The emphasis here is in reference to Shadowheart's memories of Viconia having been erased.

60.speaker: Minsc
60.text: You. Boo would have recognised your foul stench, had you not defiled his nose with evil Sharran incense!
60.context: NodeContext: Low, indignant - seeing Viconia DeVir again for the first time in years

3.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
3.text: Always a pleasure to see old acquaintances. But you would be wise to not interfere in what is to come.
3.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

7.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
7.text: Before me, you had no purpose in this world.

73.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
73.text: Welcome home. Now descend to me - you have much to answer for.

19.speaker: Shadowheart
19.text: The artefact doesn't matter anymore. Not to me.

45.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
45.text: What matters to you is but a grain of sand lost at the bottom of the deepest, darkest sea.

33.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
33.text: You can. I made it so. But allow me to jog your memory...

68.speaker: Shadowheart
68.text: My life was taken from me. I want it back.

44.speaker: Shadowheart
44.text: I want my lost memories restored.

24.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
24.text: Loss is a gift. Do you still not understand? Clearly freedom has eroded my teachings.

29.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
29.text: This can be remedied - if there is anything left of you that is worth saving.

27.speaker: Shadowheart
27.text: That voice... Do I know you?

46.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
46.text: More than you realise, girl. All you know comes from my tutelage. Before me, you were... you were of a very different stripe.

30.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
30.text: How unsophisticated of you, girl. Could you have not at least attempted a lie? You always did possess a stubborn streak.
